Key Match Events: Thanh Long Le scored two goals in the 83' and 90+1' minutes for Vietnam
Pre-Game Insights: Vietnam have a three-match losing run in all competitions
Vietnam have conceded a second-half strike in three successive competitive fixtures
Indonesia have been rather sloppy defensively over the past couple of months, conceding multiple goals in three of their previous four matches in all competitions
Post-Match Reflections: Vietnam won 1-0 in their opening fixture, but lost to Japan 4-2
Indonesia suffered a 3-1 defeat at the hands of Iraq
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Abdullah bin Nasser bin Khalifa Stadium
Vietnam are pointless after one match, while Indonesia have lost their second match at this tournament in each of their previous four group stage campaigns
Others: Vietnam will look back at the 2019 group stage and know that nothing is over just yet
The Indonesians have conceded in all but one of their Asian Cup fixtures historically (0-0 draw versus Kuwait in 2000)
